        Parameters:
        input - The player's input command

      • EnemyKingPosition

        public java.lang.String EnemyKingPosition(Tile[][] board,
                                          boolean white)
        Parameters:
        board - the current chess board
        white - the color of the king to not search for
        Returns:
        String Returns the location of the other player's king, or null if it was not found

      • Enpassant

        public boolean Enpassant()
        Returns:
        boolean returns true if a piece can en passant, false otherwise will always return false, except for pawns who override this method

      • getEnpassant

        public boolean getEnpassant()
        Returns:
        boolean returns true if a piece can be en passanted, false otherwise will always return false, except for pawns who override this method

      • piecesBetween

        public boolean piecesBetween(char initCol,
                             char initRow,
                             char newCol,
                             char newRow,
                             Tile[][] board)
        Parameters:
        initCol - the initial column to be checked
        initRow - the initial row to be checked
        newCol - the last column to be checked
        newRow - the last row to be checked
        board - the current chess board
        Returns:
        boolean Returns true if there are any pieces between the initial position and the final position, false otherwise
